name: Prisma Cloud
description: Welcome to the Deployment Wizard!  These steps will guide you through configuring your content pack so you'll have a working use case when the wizard finishes. Make sure to follow the steps in order, you can always continue the wizard where you left off. Learn more about this packâ€™s deployment.

fetching_integrations.name: GoogleKubernetesEngine

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the Prisma cloud incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Graph Mail Single User-mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'GoogleKubernetesEngine' instance to start fetching Prisma cloud incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Microsoft Graph Mail Single User-mapper'.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'GoogleKubernetesEngine' integration to work with your Phishing use case.

fetching_integrations.name: Azure Kubernetes Services

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the Prisma cloud incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Gmail Single User - Incoming Mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'Azure Kubernetes Services' instance to start fetching Prisma cloud incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Phishing. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Gmail Single User - Incoming Mapper'.

fetching_integrations.description: Set up the 'Azure Kubernetes Services' integration to work with your Prisma Cloud use case.
